title: Stein Variational Guided Model Predictive Path Integral Control: Proposal and Experiments with Fast Maneuvering Vehicles
author: Kohei Honda
Naoki Akai

desc: Improvement to Model Predictive Path Integral Control using Stein Variational Gradient Descent and provides real-world experimental results with fast maneuvering vehicles

title: When to Replan? An Adaptive Replanning Strategy for Autonomous Navigation using Deep Reinforcement Learning
author: Kohei Honda

desc: Adaptive replanning strategy for autonomous mobile robot navigation based on Deep Reinforcement Learning
